name: Dev Container
postCreateCommand: git config --global user.email "$MAIL_ADDRESS" && git config --global user.name "$USER_NAME"

set -e; echo MAIL=$MAIL_ADDRESS USER=$USER_NAME; git config --global user.email "$MAIL_ADDRESS" && git config --global user.name "$USER_NAME" && git config --global alias.co checkout && git config --global alias.cleanup '!git branch --merged | grep -v '\*' | xargs git branch -d'
